steps.action: Install CMD Agent with a given version to test.
Open Powershell terminal, go to the install folder of CMD client agent, default one is: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Cloud Managed Desktop Extension\CMDExtension

Run the powershell command in the folder: 
(Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter Microsoft.Management.Services.* .).VersionInfo
steps.expected: Get VersionInfo of a list of files

steps.action: Check the FileVersion field of all the listed dll / exe files (can exclude config and pdb files)
steps.expected: The FileVersion shall be the same as the installed CMD client agent version.
